TMDA In Use

The following sites use TMDA as part of a product or service offering. If you'd like to be included in this list, please let us know.

  • The Free Software Foundation (for @gnu.org addresses and mail.gnu.org lists)
  • Gmane
  • Actrix Networks Ltd
  • NightSky Hosting
  • GeekISP
  • WestPAnet, Inc.
  • MailSnare
  • dungog.net
  • Stand Blue Technology
  • Open Vistas Networking, Inc.
  • myprivacy.ca
  • 2ndmail.com
  • Internet Nebraska
  • eScrubber
  • Department of Physics and Astronomy, University of Leicester, UK
  • Stanford Computer Graphics Laboratory
  • CentralPets
  • my.gnus.org
  • mail.socha.net
  • Rupture Dot Net
  • Paradigm-Omega
  • Mintersoft's VisualMail is a web-based e-mail client with integrated TMDA functionality.
